package org.conscrypt;

import java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException;

    static final String MGF1_ALGORITHM_NAME = "MGF1";
    static final String MGF1_OID = "1.2.840.113549.1.1.8";

    static String getJcaDigestAlgorithmStandardName(String str) {
        String upperCase = str.toUpperCase(Locale.US);
        String str2 = "SHA-256";
        if (!"SHA-256".equals(upperCase) && !"2.16.840.1.101.3.4.2.1".equals(upperCase)) {
            str2 = "SHA-512";
            if (!"SHA-512".equals(upperCase) && !"2.16.840.1.101.3.4.2.3".equals(upperCase)) {
                str2 = McElieceCCA2KeyGenParameterSpec.SHA1;
                if (!McElieceCCA2KeyGenParameterSpec.SHA1.equals(upperCase) && !"1.3.14.3.2.26".equals(upperCase)) {
                    str2 = McElieceCCA2KeyGenParameterSpec.SHA384;
                    if (!McElieceCCA2KeyGenParameterSpec.SHA384.equals(upperCase) && !"2.16.840.1.101.3.4.2.2".equals(upperCase)) {
                        str2 = McElieceCCA2KeyGenParameterSpec.SHA224;
                        if (!McElieceCCA2KeyGenParameterSpec.SHA224.equals(upperCase) && !"2.16.840.1.101.3.4.2.4".equals(upperCase)) {
                            return null;
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        return str2;
    }

    static long getEVP_MDByJcaDigestAlgorithmStandardName(String str) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException {
        String upperCase = str.toUpperCase(Locale.US);
        if ("SHA-256".equals(upperCase)) {
            return SHA256.EVP_MD;
        }
        if ("SHA-512".equals(upperCase)) {
            return SHA512.EVP_MD;
        }
        if (McElieceCCA2KeyGenParameterSpec.SHA1.equals(upperCase)) {
            return SHA1.EVP_MD;
        }
        if (McElieceCCA2KeyGenParameterSpec.SHA384.equals(upperCase)) {
            return SHA384.EVP_MD;
        }
        if (McElieceCCA2KeyGenParameterSpec.SHA224.equals(upperCase)) {
            return SHA224.EVP_MD;
        }
        throw new NoSuchAlgorithmException("Unsupported algorithm: " + str);
    }

    static int getDigestSizeBytesByJcaDigestAlgorithmStandardName(String str) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException {
        String upperCase = str.toUpperCase(Locale.US);
        if ("SHA-256".equals(upperCase)) {
            return SHA256.SIZE_BYTES;
        }
        if ("SHA-512".equals(upperCase)) {
            return SHA512.SIZE_BYTES;
        }
        if (McElieceCCA2KeyGenParameterSpec.SHA1.equals(upperCase)) {
            return SHA1.SIZE_BYTES;
        }
        if (McElieceCCA2KeyGenParameterSpec.SHA384.equals(upperCase)) {
            return SHA384.SIZE_BYTES;
        }
        if (McElieceCCA2KeyGenParameterSpec.SHA224.equals(upperCase)) {
            return SHA224.SIZE_BYTES;
        }
        throw new NoSuchAlgorithmException("Unsupported algorithm: " + str);
    }

    static String getJcaDigestAlgorithmStandardNameFromEVP_MD(long j) {
        if (j == MD5.EVP_MD) {
            return "MD5";
        }
        if (j == SHA1.EVP_MD) {
            return McElieceCCA2KeyGenParameterSpec.SHA1;
        }
        if (j == SHA224.EVP_MD) {
            return McElieceCCA2KeyGenParameterSpec.SHA224;
        }
        if (j == SHA256.EVP_MD) {
            return "SHA-256";
        }
        if (j == SHA384.EVP_MD) {
            return McElieceCCA2KeyGenParameterSpec.SHA384;
        }
        if (j == SHA512.EVP_MD) {
            return "SHA-512";
        }
        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown EVP_MD reference");
    }

    static final class MD5 {
        static final long EVP_MD;
        static final String JCA_NAME = "MD5";
        static final String OID = "1.2.840.113549.2.5";
        static final int SIZE_BYTES;

        static {
            long jEVP_get_digestbyname = NativeCrypto.EVP_get_digestbyname("md5");
            EVP_MD = jEVP_get_digestbyname;
            SIZE_BYTES = NativeCrypto.EVP_MD_size(jEVP_get_digestbyname);
        }

        private MD5() {
        }
    }

    static final class SHA1 {
        static final long EVP_MD;
        static final String JCA_NAME = "SHA-1";

            SIZE_BYTES = NativeCrypto.EVP_MD_size(jEVP_get_digestbyname);
